00048 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00053 /*********************************************************************/
00059 void EXTI_Init(void)
00060 {
00061         LPC_SC->EXTINT = 0xF;
00062         LPC_SC->EXTMODE = 0x0;
00063         LPC_SC->EXTPOLAR = 0x0;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 /*********************************************************************/
00072 void    EXTI_DeInit(void)
00073 {
00074         ;
00075 }
00076 
00077 /*********************************************************************/
00085 void EXTI_Config(EXTI_InitTypeDef *EXTICfg)
00086 {
00087         LPC_SC->EXTINT = 0x0;
00088         EXTI_SetMode(EXTICfg->EXTI_Line, EXTICfg->EXTI_Mode);
00089         EXTI_SetPolarity(EXTICfg->EXTI_Line, EXTICfg->EXTI_polarity);
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*********************************************************************/
00104 void EXTI_SetMode(EXTI_LINE_ENUM EXTILine, EXTI_MODE_ENUM mode)
00105 {
00106         if(mode == EXTI_MODE_EDGE_SENSITIVE)
00107         {
00108                 LPC_SC->EXTMODE |= (1 << EXTILine);
00109         }
00110         else if(mode == EXTI_MODE_LEVEL_SENSITIVE)
00111         {
00112                 LPC_SC->EXTMODE &= ~(1 << EXTILine);
00113         }
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*********************************************************************/
00128 void EXTI_SetPolarity(EXTI_LINE_ENUM EXTILine, EXTI_POLARITY_ENUM polarity)
00129 {
00130         if(polarity == EXTI_POLARITY_HIGH_ACTIVE_OR_RISING_EDGE)
00131         {
00132                 LPC_SC->EXTPOLAR |= (1 << EXTILine);
00133         }
00134         else if(polarity == EXTI_POLARITY_LOW_ACTIVE_OR_FALLING_EDGE)
00135         {
00136                 LPC_SC->EXTPOLAR &= ~(1 << EXTILine);
00137         }
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*********************************************************************/
00149 void EXTI_ClearEXTIFlag(EXTI_LINE_ENUM EXTILine)
00150 {
00151                 LPC_SC->EXTINT |= (1 << EXTILine);
00152 }
00153 
00158 #endif /* _EXTI */
